name.ch: 奈米材料製程與檢測技術

department.ch: 材料科學與工程研究所碩士班
department.en: Institute of Materials Science and Engineering

goal.ch: "The objective of this course is to introduce the fundamentals and comprehensive knowledge in the field of nanotechnology, with the emphasis on the fabrication, characterization, properties and applications of nanomaterials including zero (quantum dots and nanoparticles),  one (nanowires), two-dimensional, and some special nanomaterials. More specifically, this course will cover (1) physical chemistry of solid surface,  (2) basic principles related to fabrication of nanomaterials, and (3) a comprehensive review of the established techniques and methods for the synthesis and characterization of nanomaterials and nanostructures."
goal.en: "The objective of this course is to introduce the fundamentals and comprehensive knowledge in the field of nanotechnology, with the emphasis on the fabrication, characterization, properties and applications of nanomaterials including zero (quantum dots and nanoparticles),  one (nanowires), two-dimensional, and some special nanomaterials. More specifically, this course will cover (1) physical chemistry of solid surface,  (2) basic principles related to fabrication of nanomaterials, and (3) a comprehensive review of the established techniques and methods for the synthesis and characterization of nanomaterials and nanostructures."

outline.ch:
1. 材料表面的物化性質
2. 零維奈米材料性質與應用
3. 一維奈米材料性質與應用
4. 二維奈米材料性質與應用
5. 其它種奈米材料製程
6. 奈米材料的檢測技術
7. 奈米材料的應用
outline.en:
1. Physical chemistry of solid surface
2. Zero-dimensional nanostructures
3. One-dimensional nanostructures
4. Two-dimensional nanostructures
5. Special nanomaterials
6. Characterization and properties of nanomaterials
7. Application of nanomaterials

textbook.ch:
"Nanostructures and Nanomaterials: Synthesis, Properties and Applications, by
Guozhong Cao, ISBN: 1-86094-415-9, Imperial College Press, UK, 2004."
textbook.en:
"Nanostructures and Nanomaterials: Synthesis, Properties and Applications, by
Guozhong Cao, ISBN: 1-86094-415-9, Imperial College Press, UK, 2004."

gradMethod.ch:
Attendance/Performance 10%
Midterm examination: 30%
Final examination: 30%
Oral presentation: 30%( each student will choose a specific type or application of nanomaterials and present to the class as a short lecture.)
gradMethod.en:
Attendance/Performance 10%
Midterm examination: 30%
Final examination: 30%
Oral presentation: 30% ( each student will choose a specific type or application of nanomaterials and present to the class as a short lecture.)

系所:限機械工程學系博士班、化學工程與材料工程學系博士班、機械工程學系光機電工程博士班、能源工程研究所博士班、機械工程學系-工學博士班、化學工程與材料工程學系-工學博士班、材料科學與工程研究所-工學博士班。

Department:PhD in Mechanical Engineering、PhD in Chemical and Material Engineering、MSc in Opto-Mechatronics Engineering、PhD in Energy Engineering、 、 、  only.
